column3: All Logitech products must focus on battery access to enable repair and recycling
column5: No access, battery glued in (Example: Logitech Crayon)
column6: Removed with damage, but still possible (Example: MX Master 3s)

column3: If your product does not have a battery, ensure that the cables can be replaced.
column9: All cables removable from both sides with standard connector type
